sdata.j: ハリケーンによる|↑死者|↑↓ししゃ↓の↑数↑↓かず↓は２００↑人↑↓にん↓にのぼった。
sdata.e: The death toll from the hurricane climbed to 200.

sdata.j: その↑鉄道↑↓てつどう↓↑事故↑↓じこ↓で|↑死者|↑↓ししゃ↓↑三↑↓さん↓↑名↑↓めい↓、↑重軽傷↑↓じゅうけいしょう↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓１０↑名↑↓めい↓が↑出↑↓で↓た。
sdata.e: Three persons were killed and ten were severely or slightly injured in the railway accident.

sdata.e: The toll from the accident was 5 persons dead and 100 persons injured.

sdata.e: As a result of a traffic accident, several persons were killed.
